programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Bench Blocked - When Sarah and Duck's favourite bench is in use, the pair find other things to do in the park.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Blown Away - It's too windy for umbrellas and hats but not too windy for Nelly and Nora.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Dog Loves Spelling - Dog and Pug visit a forest where the witches are planning a great 'spelling' contest. Their friend Witch Willow needs their help.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep61
programme.desc: Music Power - Monty investigates how music can make people feel different emotions, after Jeanie tells him that music should have that effect.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep30
programme.desc: The Thing That Called Bob - The Dinopaws come over the hill wondering what makes them - them?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Frozen Out - Team Tinpo return home to their HQ to discover it stuck in the "locked" position! Will they stay "frozen out"?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep24
programme.desc: One Step at a Time - A Po lives in a house on a hill where the view is so incredible it takes his breath away. Unfortunately, the journey up to the house takes his breath away too.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Christmas Swim - The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep15
programme.desc: The Ambition Badge - Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep14
programme.desc: The Accessory Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep13
programme.desc: The Mountain Badge - The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Billy And Champer's Big Adventure - Champer wants to draw the best adventure ever to win a Super Numtum comic competition.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Tiddly Phone - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po receive a call on the Tubby Phone. It's the Tiddlytubbies who ring to say hello, just before the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Chicken - Dee encourages a friend to say 'chicken' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of chickens - a brown chicken, a white chicken, a clucking chicken and some friendly chickens.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Say Snow Go - No matter how fast he clears the path, it just keeps snowing on a Citizen Po's garden!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep8
programme.desc: It's Time to Fly a Kite - JoJo and Gran Gran take Gran Gran's old kite to fly in the park where it flies away and rips, so Gran Gran sews it up. JoJo learns that if something breaks, it can sometimes be repaired!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep63
programme.desc: Fun With Clouds - A family trip for Monty is ruined by the cloudy weather, and they all wish they would disappear, until Monty and Jimmy take another approach.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep62
programme.desc: You're Never Too Old - Monty is picked on at school for keeping his cuddly toys, and thinks he may be too old for them. This leads him to think about whether people can ever be too old to play.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Shaun - Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drawing Badge - It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep20
programme.desc: The Same Badge - As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep44
programme.desc: Cave Train Trouble, Slovenia - Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Asparagus - Dad tells Bluey to mind her manners at the table - they're not animals. But when Bluey gets her hands on a stick of magic asparagus, she shows them everyone's got a wild side.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Teasing - Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Barbary Macaques - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the rock of Gibraltar, in Europe, to count all the barbary macaques that live there.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Vet Tales S2 Ep10
programme.desc: McGregor the pony - Ferne meets Evan at a Riding Centre to see McGregor the Pony who has a problem with his hooves and the vet is coming to give him an X-ray. Rory joins a vet at a Zoo to see how you give the biggest parrot in the world a check-up.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Seaweed Super Soup - Captain Captain is in a grumpy mood because she hasn't had her pre-game feast.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep16
programme.desc: The Rainbow Badge - The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Waterspout Wipeout - A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.desc: Planetarium Aquarium - Sarah and Duck go to the aquarium to track down a waving fish.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Chancla Force / Fluff Love - Carl takes Rosa's chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! // Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Battle of the Grandpas / Prankaversary - When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Zoo-mergency! - After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Wedding Daze Part 1 / Wedding Daze Part 2 - When the boys accidentally break a family heirloom they must find a way to fix it and put it out of harms way for good. But how? It's been in the family for decades!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Fire Safety - When the girls at school develop a crush on the Fire Marshall, Alvin decides to be a hero with disastrous results.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Castle Catastrophe - After causing an accident at a historic castle, Cheesy and Alvin must work as reenactors to pay for the damage.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Party Animals - Alvin books the band at a birthday party only to discover they've been booked for the petting zoo, as the pets!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep154
programme.desc: Drive Thru / The Hot Shot - Mr. Krabs tries to make even more money by turning a hole in the Krusty Krab wall into a cash-making drive-thru window! // Tony Fast Jr., the son of a famous race car driver, tries to teach SpongeBob how to drive.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep104
programme.desc: In Search of Camp Noodist / Kitchen Sponge - SpongeBob, Sandy, and Patrick hike through the woods in search of a fabled nudist colony. // SpongeBob helps Plankton at the Krusty Kanteen, leading to the development of a very familiar sandwich.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Valentine's Day of Horror - Nate has decided this Valentine's Day, he will finally profess his love for his dream girl in the form of a grand gesture, but the day of love quickly turns into a nightmare after Nate's "gift" gives the entire school food poisoning.

programme.title: Jinxed S01 Ep1
programme.desc: Jinxed - The Murphys are pretty much the unluckiest gang in history, thanks to a 100-year-old curse that followed their family for generations.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep165
programme.desc: House Sittin' for Sandy / Smoothe Jazz at Bikini Bottom - All is quiet while SpongeBob is house-sitting for Sandy... until Patrick shows up! // SpongeBob and Squidward lose their passes and try desperately to sneak backstage at the sold-out Kelpy G show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep166
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble / The Way of the Sponge - When SpongeBob and Patrick accidentally destroy Sandy's air supply, they have to help her find more oxygen. // SpongeBob wants to earn his belt from karate master Fuzzy Acorns. Will Sandy be able to help?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep168
programme.desc: Restraining SpongeBob / Fiasco! - Squidward has had enough of SpongeBobs annoying antics and issues a restraining order against him. // Plankton thinks hes stolen a Krabby Patty from the Krusty Krab, but hes really stolen an art piece by the famous artist, Fiasco.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep169
programme.desc: Are You Happy Now? / Planet of the Jellyfish - When Squidward cant recall his happiest memory, SpongeBob helps him create one. // When an evil Jellien overlord replaces everyone in Bikini Bottom with clones, its up to SpongeBob and Sandy to defeat him!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over - Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep258
programme.desc: Boss for a Day / The Goofy Newbie - Mr. Krabs has an accident and leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab. What could go wrong? // Patrick takes a job at the Goofy Goober when he finds out the employees get free ice cream.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lost in Couch / Pat-a-thon - Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down. // Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pearl Wants to Be a Star - Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Qilin Time - Po is embarrassed when his dad takes him on a wild goose chase, but it turns out his dad is not so crazy afterall.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Library - A professor leads the kids to a spirit library in the middle of the desert, where Sokka hopes to discover powerful secrets to use against the Fire Nation.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Action Reaction - Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when he's doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot / Smotherly Love - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! // Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep302
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper / High Moltage - Its off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. // The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action stars blockbuster movie!

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Pondgea's Got Talent / Raging Mole - When Pumpers holds a talent show, SwaySway must overcome his stage fright to perform a love song for Jenny Quackles. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce convince the Bread Maker to lose a wrestling match to Lava Mole.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Queen is Back - Kendar decides to give Axe to Alivn the demon so Alvin will leave them all alone. Brendar and the gang are devastated and decide to go on a quest to rescue Axe.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Cleo for Class President / The Janitor - When Cleo runs for class president, Ollie summons Courtney Poweredge from the pack to be her campaign manager. // Nobody but Ollie suspects that the new school janitor is a monster.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Shell in a Cell / Minotaur Maze - Leo unseats Raph's idol as pro wrestling champion of the world. // Beat the mutant maze in 30 minutes or less and the pizza is free.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: D.I.N.K. / Dangerous Debbie - Sanjay and Craig are suspicious of the familys new high-tech car that anticipates their every whim. // A love-smitten Craig kidnaps an electric eel from the tank of a sushi restaurant.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Dorg and the Coolnado / Dorg Writes a Paper - Jet thinks he's losing his cool, so he casts a spell and ends up an ice-cold villain! It's on Dorg and the gang to warm Jet's heart and save Normill! // The gang resurrects town founder Bertram Bumberback to help Dorg write a paper!

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep126
programme.desc: A Bopwork Orange / Freeze Tag - Boog's gotta learn to stop bopping customers, or he's gonna lose his job. // When Man-Arctica comes down to play freeze tag with the kids, they quickly realize he plays by his own rules... which means freezing everyone in sight.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Cruisin' for a Bruisin' / Puppy Love - To distract Dudley from bothering her on T.U.F.F.s vacation cruise, Kitty lies and tells him that theyre on a stakeout. // Dudley gets a crush for the new temp at T.U.F.F., Fifi Oui Oui - but "she" has a surprise.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep621
programme.desc: A Monster Crush - The Winx travel to Zenith in hopes of finding a special technology that can track down the invisible Cloudtower. But Tecna's reunion with her family is interrupted when Frankenstein, sent by Selina, falls in love with Tecna.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep622
programme.desc: The Music Cafe - Musa establishes the Alfea music caf, and the Winx use the instruments' magic to protect Alfea from flying Cloudtower. But when Rumpelstiltskin steals Musa's voice, the Winx must get it back in time to ward off Cloudtower.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Small Change / Rip Van Stinkle - Felicity is questioning what she's meant to be when she baby-sits a little changeling girl, struggling with the same issue. // When Felicity comes to the aid of a stinky stranger named Rip Van Stinkle, he vows to be at her beck and call for life.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Gane vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Accor, Arena in Paris, France on Saturday, September 2, and its bringing the nations biggest star, former interim heavyweight champion Ciryl Gane, to headline once again in the UFC Fight Night main event against surging Moldovan contender Serghei Spivac. On a quest to return to the top of the division, Gane scored a blistering third-round knockout of Tai Tuivasa in his hometown in the UFCs first visit to France in 2022, and hes looking for a repeat against Spivac, who enters this bout on a three-fight winning streak, most recently finishing Derrick Lewis in a single round
